long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check your stats to compare it with your opponents.

Go to PlanesWalkerPoints web-site and login.

Click on "Show My Stats" button.
Extension will switch language to English automatically.
You will see summary stat to all your matches.

Now you can export your data in CSV format.
